name: Sardar Udham
bio: Indian Revolutionary Udham Singh who's better known for the assassination of Michael O Dwyer in London, who was behind the Jallianwala Bagh Massacre on April 13, 1919. The story sets out how Udham Singh survived the massacre on day of Baisakhi which killed around 400 people and injured around 1000 and avenges those who died. —alex.mjacko@gmail.com
